action.action-desc: Mr. Veasey introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit institutions of higher education from denying students admission on the basis of immigration or naturalization status.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the American Dream Promise Act.

section.header: Prohibition on denial of admission due to immigration or naturalization status
section.text: Section 487(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1094(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The institution will not deny a student admission at such institution on the basis of the studentâ€™s immigration or naturalization status.
